name: DarkSide
description:
A tool for easily toggling between Light/Dark theme or any 2 themes, and also for theme creation.


How it works


Video

https://youtu.be/LfTFuMJFAac


Playground

https://www.figma.com/community/file/993838088453586739/DarkSide-Playground


Switch

  1. You need to group your styles. Example: “Light”/“Dark”, “Desktop”/“Mobile”.
  2. If this is your team style file, you need to publish the file and click “Save team styles”, local files ignore this step.
  3. Click the "OmegaEffect" button to complete the theme switch.


Create

  1. Create the node, its name will become the style name.
  2. Select all the nodes that need to be created as styles.
  3. Select the corresponding create button according to the type of create style.


Creators: @CuriosityWen @WashingtonHua
